title: Dinnerbone: 正在进行各种优化与BUG修复
author: obby825
txt_content:
本帖最后由 bobby825 于 2015-9-18 21:37 编辑 



Dinnerbone: I found a potential cause of FPS drops people experienced since 1.8, should be fixed in next snapshot. Possible side effect may be block lag
Dinnerbone: 我找到了一个自1.8以来的造成FPS下降的潜在原因，这应该会在下一个快照中被修复。但是这个修复有可能会造成方块延迟的负面效果。
Dinnerbone: (Technical info: we rendered nearby chunks on main thread, slowing FPS. Now we'll only do that if it's "player placed", saving lots of FPS)
Dinnerbone: （技术信息：我们在主线程中渲染附近的区块，这导致了FPS的下降。现在我们只会对玩家所在的区块这样做了，这大量提高了FPS。）
